text.div: This code system defines the quantity units of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products.

name: CarinRtpbcBillingUnitCodeSystem
title: CARIN RTPBC Billing Unit Code System
description: This code system defines the quantity units of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products.

concept.definition: Quantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of grams
Quantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of milliliters
Quantity unit of measure for products billed as individual items (e.g., tablets)
